Texts.Chs: 在你走之前记得检查自己的补给，虽说我们没有太多物品提供给你，但是只要你要，我们就会给你。
Texts.Eng: Don't forget to load up before you go. We don't have much, but we'll sell you what we can.

Texts.Chs: 现在情况处于最遭的时候。
我听说洞穴的下水道内有一个入口。
Texts.Eng: I hear there's an entrance to the sewers in the caves.

Texts.Chs: 我衷心希望你能成功！因为一旦你失败，我们就只能拼命了。
Texts.Eng: I hope you succeed - mostly because if you don't, we'll have to go out ourselves.

Texts.Chs: 休息一会儿，整理一下自己的补给。
Texts.Eng: It's chilly out there. Wrap up well.

Texts.Chs: 科学发展部这次挟持了我们的人作为人质。
Texts.Eng: The Miniknog often takes hostages to insure good behaviour, but this is something else altogether.

Texts.Chs: 这已是距离目标建筑最近的距离了。
Texts.Eng: This is as close as we dare to get to the commissar's dacha.

Texts.Chs: 留意开关下的炸药桶，你可以攻击它来破坏开关。
Texts.Eng: Watch out for explosive barrels under switches. You can blow those up to destroy and deactivate the switch.

Texts.Chs: 祝你好运，希望你能成功！
Texts.Eng: Whatever route you take into the dacha, good luck!
